api_list.name: Product Details
api_list.description:
Get the product details for a given product id and a specific country.
Default country is `United States`.
Specify country with country name or country code.

Allowed countries:
Default: `us`
- Germany (de)
- France (fr)
- Australia (au)
- Austria (at)
- Canada (ca)
- Hong Kong (hk)
- Ireland (ie)
- Italy (it)
- Malaysia (my)
- Netherlands (nl)
- Singapore (sg)
- Switzerland (ch)
- United Kingdom (uk)

required_parameters.name: product_id
required_parameters.description: ID of the product. Can be obtained from the url of the product or by using the `/search` endpoint.

optional_parameters.name: country
optional_parameters.description:
Valid country to return offers for.
Valid values are in description of this endpoint.
Default: `united states`.

optional_parameters.name: country_code
optional_parameters.description:
Country code of the valid country to return offers for.
Valid values are in description of this endpoint.
Default: `us`.

api_list.name: Search Products
api_list.description:
Search for products on Ebay in specific country.
Returns the `last_page` that can be scraped for the specific `search_query`.
Default country is `United States`.
Specify country with country name or country code.

Allowed countries:
Default: `us`
- Germany (de)
- France (fr)
- Australia (au)
- Austria (at)
- Canada (ca)
- Hong Kong (hk)
- Ireland (ie)
- Italy (it)
- Malaysia (my)
- Netherlands (nl)
- Singapore (sg)
- Switzerland (ch)
- United Kingdom (uk)

required_parameters.name: search_query
required_parameters.description: Search Query used in Ebay search

optional_parameters.name: country
optional_parameters.description:
Valid country to return offers for.
Valid values are in description of this endpoint.
Default: `united states`.

optional_parameters.name: country_code
optional_parameters.description:
Country code of the valid country to return offers for.
Valid values are in description of this endpoint.
Default: `us`.
